 RELEASE INFO:                                           ??????????????    ? ?
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 The power of professional compositing and animation is now available for 
 enthusiasts and professionals with Chromanator. Offering unprecedented 
 power at a revolutionary price, Chromanator is a new kind of program for a 
 new kind of filmmaker. 
           
 Chromanator is an all-inclusive, standalone application for Windows 
 2000/XP and Mac OS X that is designed to work with all your favourite 
 video media and editing applications (including Apple's iMovie, Adobe 
 Premiere and many more).
